title: [jsfm] Still throw caught errors in event handler and callback
body:
Fix #1798

Javascript exceptions should be handled by native engines, catch them in the js framework will omit some errors and make developers hard to find reasons.

body: move `extendCallNative` method from globalContext to instanceContext

title: Update libweexjss to fix jsc thread deaclock
body: build jss with gcc

title: *[Android] interaction position for fix element
body:
- for fix element ,parent is root node

so interactionAbsoluteX =
-  right : `mParent.isFixed() ? cssLeft : mParent.interactionAbsoluteX + cssLeft`
- wrong: `nullParent ? 0 : mParent.getAbsoluteY() + getCSSLayoutTop();`

title: Do not print log if msg is null
body: Fix NPE

body: add jsc adapter to control jsc process reboot

title: *[Android] update for weex dev-tool
body:
- transfer peformance info to devtool
- show interactionView
- add log switch of jsengin/jsfm/weexcore ,to analyze interactionTime
- for large img，log url，size

title: * [Android] edit interaction logic && edit exception report logic
body:
- determine if the element is on the screen (element edge)
- if component has "ignoreInteraction" attrs，componentTree will not calculate
- report pageName  (not url)
- every instance report one overlay exception at most

body: Check env status after attachThread

title: [WEEX-669][android] fix slider crash when adapter is null
body:
fix slider crash when adapter is null

java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void com.taobao.weex.ui.view.WXCirclePageAdapter.setLayoutDirectionRTL(boolean)' on a null object reference
at com.taobao.weex.ui.component.WXSlider.setLayout(WXSlider.java:217)
at com.taobao.weex.ui.action.GraphicActionLayout.executeAction(GraphicActionLayout.java:44)
at com.taobao.weex.ui.action.BasicGraphicAction.run(BasicGraphicAction.java:68)
at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:751)
at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:95)
at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:154)
at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6195)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:889)
at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:779)

title: [WEEX-668][Android] errorCode type edit (-2013 is a js exception)
body:
errorCode type edit 

`-2013` is js exception

title: [WEEX-657][iOS] Add a feature to control the offset of list attach to…
body:
… the bottom`

I have add a '_isContentAttachBottom' attribute in WXListComponent to
 controll whether open this feature. The Weex Component can pass the
‘_isContentAttachBottom’ variable from js to native by 'initWithRef'
 and 'updateAttributes' function. The '_isContentAttachBottom' variable
will be analysed to a bool type and cached in WXTableView object.
 When the WXTableView object is called the 'setFrame' function,if the
'_isContentAttachBottom' variable is true , then the 'contentOffset'
 function of WXTableView object will be triggered to keep the content offset
at the bottom.When the WXTableView object is running the transition
animation, the 'setFrame' will be call every 16 msec . So when the animation
is excuting，the content offset of list will be alaways attached to the bottom .

feature: 657

title: + Add codeOwner
[Android] fix scroller memory leack because of OnAttachedListener
[iOS] fix infinite recursion caused by affine type
body:
When registering a subcomponent of base component, take `list` for example, the key-value pair of `"list": "list"` is appended to `affineTypes_` by `RenderCreator::RegisterAffineType(const std::string &type, const std::string& asType)`. This causes `RenderCreator::IsAffineType(const std::string &type, const std::string& asType)` to recur infinitely

CheckList:

**if** *isBugFix* **:**

  * [x] Make sure that you add at least one unit test for the bug which you had fixed.

**elif** *isNewFeature* **:**

  * [ ] Update API docs for the component.
  * [ ] Update/Add demo to demonstrate new feature.
  * [ ] Update test scripts for the feature.
  * [ ] Add unit tests for the feature.

title: [iOS]Fix bug: register service method needs a callback
body:
The operation of registering service is in a child thread named jsthread. We must render page js after downloaded js service file and make sure it’s executed. So the register service method need a callback. In this callback, we render the page js.

You can reproduce this bug, If you try to register a large size of js service file.

title: Fix bug:  register service method needs a callback
body:
The operation of registering service is in a child thread named jsthread.  We must render `page js` after downloaded `js service file` and make sure it’s executed. So the register service method need a callback. In this callback, we render the `page js`.

You can reproduce this bug, If you try to register a large size of  js service file.

中文解释：
由于页面中用到了js service文件中的模块，所以我在iOS中先调用`register service`再调用`render page`，以确保页面加载前js service已经注册进来。
但是当我注册了一个1.8M大小的js-service文件，我发现页面加载失败了。查看sdk源码发现`register service`内部执行js的过程是放在子线程进行的，所以我`render page`很可能会晚于`register service`。
所以，`register service`方法需要支持回调，这样我们在回调中再去`render page`就不会出现页面加载出来但是`register service`还没执行完的情况了。

错别字修改、新 demo、较小的 bugfix、甚至较大的功能都可以直接提到 `master` 分支；

title: Update WXBridgeManager.m
body: options nullable is better for developers

title: [WEEX-657][iOS] Add a feature to control the offset of list attach to…
body:
… the bottom`

I have add a '_isContentAttachBottom' attribute in WXListComponent to
 controll whether open this feature. The Weex Component can pass the
‘_isContentAttachBottom’ variable from js to native by 'initWithRef'
 and 'updateAttributes' function. The '_isContentAttachBottom' variable
will be analysed to a bool type and cached in WXTableView object.
 When the WXTableView object is called the 'setFrame' function,if the
'_isContentAttachBottom' variable is true , then the 'contentOffset'
 function of WXTableView object will be triggered to keep the content offset
at the bottom.When the WXTableView object is running the transition
animation, the 'setFrame' will be call every 16 msec . So when the animation
is excuting，the content offset of list will be alaways attached to the bottom .

feature: 657
